description: The course_id determines the course_name. The same course identifier must always map to the same course name.
The course_id determines the number_of_credits. A given course identifier must always have the same number of credits.
The combination of course_name and number_of_credits determines the exam_duration. Courses with the same name and credit count must have the same exam duration.
The course_id must not be unique. The count of distinct course_id values must be strictly less than the total number of records to ensure redundancy for FD testing.
